enter_the_email_to_contact: Enter the email where you can be contacted. No one will see this on your profile.
create_password_with_regex: Create a password with at least 6 letters or numbers. It should be something others can't guess
wont_need_enter_info: We'll save the login info for your new account, so you won't need to enter it next time you log in.
use_your_own_birthday: Use your own birthday, even if this account is for a business, a pet or something else. No one will see this unless you choose to share it.
why_provide_birthday: Why do i need to provide my birthday ?
add_user_name_with_suggestion: Add a user name or use our suggestion. You change this any time.
agree_to_policy: Agree to Instagram's terms and polices
people_use_service_may_have_uploaded: People who use our service may have uploaded your contact information to instagram.
you_agree_to_create_account: , you agree to create an account and to Instagram's
privacy_policy_describe: describes the ways we can use the information we collect when you create an account. For example, we use this information to provide, personalize and improve our products, including ads.
add_avatar_to: Let add avatar then your friend can recognize you. Everyone can see your avatar.
create_first_post: Make this photo your first post so people can like and comment on it.
share_as_post: Share this photo as an article.
confirm_or_change_avatar: Confirm or change your profile picture
set_image_as_post: Put this photo as the first post so people can like and comment on the photo.
